name: Zotero-tools
body:
## Refresh Zotero Bookmarklet
Triggers Zotero to re-run detectWeb on a page, e.g. if the content has changed without changing the URL

[Zotero Refresh Bookmarklet](javascript:%20%20var%20ev%20=%20document.createEvent\('HTMLEvents'\);%20ev.initEvent\('ZoteroItemUpdated',%20true,%20true\);%20document.dispatchEvent\(ev\);void\(0\);)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
